get.summary: Gets all available column names for access contexts.

Gets an aggregated report of profile requests by user.

Determines if deltas available on specified ERP system for specified dates range and a reviewer (specified on the route).
Determines if deltas available on specified ERP system for specified dates range.  Available only for service users.

AccessContextEntity.description: Represents a model for Access Context.

customerId.description: Identifier of the customer Access Context belongs to.

columnName.description: Name of the column Access Context belongs to.

columnValue.description: All available comma-separated values for column.

AccessContextModel.description: Represents a model for Access Context.

customerId.description: Identifier of the customer Access Context belongs to.

columnName.description: Name of the column Access Context belongs to.

columnValue.description: All available comma-separated values for column.

displayId.description: Represents a friendly version of the id for display purposes.  Useful for UI filtering via OData.

displayReviewType.description: Represents a string version of the id for display and  UI filtering via OData.

displayPerformedByType.description: Performed By Type for UI use

percentSubmitted.description: Submission percentage for User To Role roles removal

submittedReviewers.description: Number of reviewers that submitted the review

includeChangesSinceReviewId.description: Review ID to include changes from

includedUserGroups.description: Included User Groups, none = include all

percentSubmitted.description: Submission percentage for User To Role roles removal

submittedReviewers.description: Submission percentage for User To Role roles removal

includedRiskRatings.description: Included risk ratings, none = include all

ignoreAdminLockedUsers.description: Ignore users locked by admin from analysis

ignoreFailedLoginUsers.description: Ignore users locked by failed login from analysis

displayId.description: Represents a friendly version of the id for display purposes.  Useful for UI filtering via OData.

displayReviewType.description: Represents a string version of the id for display and  UI filtering via OData.

displayPerformedByType.description: Performed By Type for UI use

emptyColumns.description: Empty review item columns to hide

displayId.description: Represents a friendly version of the id for display purposes.  Useful for UI filtering via OData.

displayReviewType.description: Represents a string version of the id for display and  UI filtering via OData.

displayPerformedByType.description: Performed By Type for UI use

reviewItemId.description: ID of the reviewed item, e.g. RiskMitigatingControlReviewId, RoleTcodeReviewId, RulebookDetailsReviewId,  UserRiskReviewIdv or UserRoleReviewId.  Needed for reviewer status delegation.

userName.description: Gets or sets the name of the user.

roleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the role.

isEmployee.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is employee.

alternativeUserName.description: Gets or sets the name of the alternative user.

isSubmitted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is submitted.

assignedFrom.description: Identifies if the user-role-profile relationship is associated with a Role or a Profile.

roleProfile.description: Identifies <see>AssignedFrom</see> as a user-to-role or user-to-profile assignment.

ruleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the rule.

ruleType.description: Gets or sets the type of the rule.

hasMitigatingControl.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has mitigating control.

isEmployee.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is employee.

alternativeUserName.description: Gets or sets the name of the alternative user.

UserRiskSapRolesInfoDto.description: Represents a model for role info for UserToRisk review item.

userRiskReviewId.description: Identifier of related UserToRisk review item.

RiskMitigatingControlReviewDto.description: Risk To Mitigating Control review item

mitigatingControlName.description: The name of the mitigating control

mitigatingControlType.description: The type of the mitigating control

requiresTesting.description: A value indicating whether item requires testing

appliedGlobally.description: A value indicating whether item is applied globally

filterByReviewer.description: Filter by current user as a reviewer?

mitigated.description: Represents whether the risk has been mitigated or not.

BusinessProcessRisk.description: Represents a business process risk rating.

name.description: Represents the name of the business process.

mitigated.description: Represents whether the risk has been mitigated or not.
Represents whether the risk has been mitigated or not.

RiskSnapshot.description: Represents a successfully completed risk snapshot.

jobId.description: The id of the risk snapshot job.

jobName.description: The name of the risk snapshot job.

securityExtractId.description: The id of the security extract used for this job.

erpSystemId.description: The id of the ERP system.

completedDate.description: The date the snapshot job was completed.

EmergencyAccessRequestModel.description: Represents the model for EAM requests.

id.description: The id of the EAM request.

displayId.description: The display property for the id of the request.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support Guid types at the moment.

profileId.description: The id of the selected EAM profile.

requesterUserId.description: The id of the user making the request.

comments.description: Comments to be recorded for the request.

startDate.description: The date and time the request will take effect.

displayDuration.description: The display property for the duration of the request.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support complex types at the moment.

DurationModel.description: Represents a model where a duration can be specified in days, hours and/or minutes.

days.description: The days part of the duration.

hours.description: The hours part of the duration.

minutes.description: The minutes part of the duration.

RequestActionModel.description: Represents a request for action for a particular EAM request.

requestId.description: Represents the id of the EAM request.

EmergencyAccessProfileModel.description: Represents the model for an EAM profile.

erpSystemId.description: The ERP system the profile belongs to.

roles.description: A collection of role names assigned to the profile.

rulebookNames.description: A collection of rulebook names selected for the profile.

owners.description: A collection of owner users selected for the profile.

ownerNames.description: FullNames of owners converted to comma separated string.

requesters.description: A collection of requester users selected for the profile.

approvers.description: A collection of approver users selected for the profile.

reviewers.description: A collection of reviewer users selected for the profile.

enabled.description: A value indicating whether the profile is enabled.

createdBy.description: The user who created the profile.

createdDate.description: The date and time the profile was created.

EmergencyAccessUserModel.description: Represents the model for an EAM user.

isPreApprovedRequester.description: A value indicating whether the user is a pre-approved requester.

EmergencyAccessProfileChangeLog.description: Represents a change log for an EA profile.

timestampUtc.description: Time (UTC) when the propery was changed.

userName.description: A user who changed the property.

emergencyAccessProfileId.description: Id of the updated EA profile.

EmergencyAccessRequestSummaryModel.description: Represents the summary model for an EAM request.

displayState.description: Represents the description of the state.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support enum types at the moment.

profileName.description: The name of the profile assigned to the current request.

profileDescription.description: The description of the profile assigned to the current request.

requesterUsername.description: The username of the user assigned as a requester.

requesterName.description: The name of the user assigned as a requester.

roleNames.description: A collection of role names for the current request.

displayRoleNames.description: The display property for the role names of the request.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support array types at the moment.

actions.description: Represents the available actions for the current request state.  Also based on user permissions.

isAdmin.description: A value indicating whether the user is an admin.

isOwner.description: A value indicating whether the user is an owner for the current request.

isRequester.description: A value indicating whether the user is the requester for the current request.

isApprover.description: A value indicating whether the user is an approver for the current request.

isReviewer.description: A value indicating whether the user is a reviewer for the current request.

hasDownloadLink.description: A flag used to determine if the response contains a downloaded link.  This is used for decisions if the link should be displayed to the user.

approvers.description: A collection of users that are approvers for this request.

displayApproverNames.description: The display property for the approvers names.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support array types at the moment.

reviewers.description: A collection of users that are reviewers for this request.

displayReviewerNames.description: The display property for the reviewers names.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support array types at the moment.

comment.description: Provides the optional comments of the request which is available when the activity state is "created".

eamRequestCommentCount.description: Number of EAM Request Comments of the EAM Request

id.description: The id of the EAM request.

displayId.description: The display property for the id of the request.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support Guid types at the moment.

profileId.description: The id of the selected EAM profile.

requesterUserId.description: The id of the user making the request.

comments.description: Comments to be recorded for the request.

startDate.description: The date and time the request will take effect.

displayDuration.description: The display property for the duration of the request.  This is needed to allow for OData filtering since OData  does not support complex types at the moment.

ProfileRequestsPerMonth.description: Represents the number of requests per month for a single profile.

requests.description: A collection of request counts by month.

RequestsPerMonth.description: Represents the request count per month.

month.description: Represents the month of the requests.

count.description: Represent how many requests in the given month.

ProfileRequestsPerUser.description: Represents the number of requests per profile per user.

profiles.description: A collection of profiles with request counts.

RequestsPerProfile.description: Represents a profile and its request count.

AutoAttachmentRequest.description: The model of the auto-attachment request.

accountId.description: The id of the account under which the request is made.

eamRequestId.description: The id of the EAM request to apply the auto-attachment.

username.description: The username of the user making the request.

SaveErpSystemBlacklistItemsModel.description: Model used to save ERP System Blacklist Items.

erpSystemId.description: The id of the target ERP System.

RolesSearchParameters.description: Represents model for search filters related to roles.

excludeUserNames.description: Collection of user names. The roles assigned to these users will be excluded from the result set.

search.description: Search string, that will be used to filter results.

bulkSearch.description: Bulk search string. Basically it's set of values separated by any delimiter.

UserRolesSearchParameters.description: Represents search parameters related to user roles.

excludeInactiveRoles.description: Determines if inactive roles should be excluded.

ErpSystemModel.description: Represents an ERP system in Access Risk Management. Doesn't contain sensitive information.

id.description: The id of the ERP system.

name.description: The name of the ERP system.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the legacy account.

customerId.description: Represents the id of the Gaia customer account.

updatedBy.description: The username of the user that last updated the entity.

updatedDate.description: The date/time value when the entity was last updated.

createdBy.description: The username of the user that created the entity.

createdDate.description: The date/time value when the entity was created.

INonSensitiveConnectionInformation.description: Marker interface. ERP specific models must inherit it to return non sensitive connection information

EmergencyAccessRequestOptionsModel.description: Represents the configuration options for EAM Requests

maxEamRequestCommentFileSize.description: The max allowed size in bytes of uploaded files

allowedEamRequestCommentFileExtensions.description: The allowed file extensions to be attached to comments

UserWhatIfRealTimeRequest.description: Model for a single user what-if realtime analysis request.

systemId.description: Reference to the system id that the analysis is running against.

username.description: Username to analyze the role changes against.

rolesToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

rolesToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

groupsToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

groupsToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

ReportLayout.description: Represents a response to a call to the reports layout endpoint.

links.description: Represents a collection of link keys for the report in question.

columns.description: Represents a collection of ErpMaestro.ArmServices.Common.Models.ReportFieldConfig values containing the column configuration for the specified report type.

filters.description: Represents a collection of ErpMaestro.ArmServices.Common.Models.Reports.ReportFilter values containing which filters are available to be used for this report.

ReportFieldConfig.description: Represents the field configuration for a report's column.

fieldId.description: Represents the unique identifier of the field.  Usually the name of the column.

enabled.description: Represents whether the report column is enabled or not.

width.description: Represents the width of the report column.

ReportFilter.description: Represents the definition of a report filter.

fieldId.description: Represents the field to be used for filtering.

lookupFieldId.description: Represents the field to be used for filtering on the lookup side.

userGroup.description: The group the user belongs to.

numberOfAssignedDirectProfiles.description: The number of assigned direct profiles.

numberOfFullyExecutedCriticalOrHighRisks.description: The number of fully-executed critical or high risks.

numberOfFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: The number of other fully-executed risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedCriticalOrHighRi.description: The number of not fully-executed critical or high risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: The number of other not fully-executed risks.

totalNumberOfUnmitigatedRisks.description: The total number of unmitigated risks.

highestLevelOfFullyExecutedUnmitigatedRi.description: The highest level of fully-executed unmitigated risks.

highestLevelOfUnmitigatedRisk.description: The highest level of unmitigated risks.

DailyCdhdrPosUtilizationSummaryModel.description: Represents the details of daily change document utilization.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

jobId.description: Represents the id of the job.
Represents the id of the job.
Represents the job id of the mitigation control.

FilteredReportRequest.description: Represents a model for report filters.

RoleDetails.description: Provides detail information about a role.

system.description: Represents the name of the system instance analyzed.

roleName.description: Represents the name of the role analyzed.

permission.description: Represents the technical StringValue field in the db of the permission identified as a function hit.

RoleInherentRiskDetails.description: Provides line item details of  permission hits where all sides of the conflict exist within the same role.

system.description: Represents the name of the system instance analyzed.

roleName.description: Represents the name of the role analyzed.

riskCode.description: Represents the unique identifier of the risk from the rulebook used for analysis.

riskName.description: Represents the descriptive name of the risk from the rulebook used for analysis.

riskRating.description: Represents the level of risk ascribed to the rule from the rulebook used for analysis. Values of this are the following: Informational, Low, Medium, High, Critical.

businessFunctionCode.description: Represents the unique identifier of one function of a risk.

businessFunctionName.description: Represents the descriptive name of one function of a risk.

businessFunctionDescription.description: Represents the descriptive text of one function of a risk.

permission.description: Represents the permission text value as seen in the user interface.

permissionAccessType.description: Represents the access type of the permission.

permission.description: Represents the technical StringValue field in the db of the permission identified as a function hit

RoleAuthorizationHitModel.description: Represents the authorization line item details for role conflict data.  Displays each authorization hit from the role with the corresponding  match from the function permission definition in the rulebook.

roleName.description: Represents the analyzed role name (AGR_NAME) risk being  summarized in the business process conflict summary.

functionCode.description: Represents the unique identifier of the function from the rulebook used for analysis.

profileName.description: Represents the SAP security authorization profile identifier.  Usually generated for a role, less often assigned directly to the user.  Typically uses the format T-AA111111, but can be customized to to other  10-character formats such as ZCUSTOM123.

tCode.description: Represents the SAP transaction code included in the role and causing a conflict  based upon the rulebook definition. Can be any combination of letters, numerals,  and special characters between 2 and 20 characters long, such as /PRO/FUGERT, BP, FB02.

roleAuthorizationName.description: Represents the SAP security authorization identifier. Typically appends a two digit  numeral to the end of the associated authorization profile ID such as T-AA11111100.

roleObject.description: Represents the SAP security authorization object included in the role and causing a conflict.  Typically a 4 to 10 character identifer with underscores such as S_TCODE, F_BKPF_BUK, M_RECH_WRK.

roleAuthorizationField.description: Represents the SAP security authorization object field included in the role  and causing a conflict. Typically shorter than the authorization object and  usually composed of only letters, such as ACTVT, KOART, TCD, JOBACTION.

roleAuthorizationValueFrom.description: Represents the SAP security authorization field value in the role. Can be  either a single fixed value (01), a wildcard (*), or a combination (GROUP1*).  This field must be populated for an authorization.

roleAuthorizationValueTo.description: Represents the SAP security authorization field value in the role. Can be either a  single fixed value (01), a wildcard (*), or a combination (GROUP1*). This field is  left blank unless the authorization is being defined as a range. The range would be  anything between the FROM value through the TO value. For example, if the FROM value  is A and the TO value is C, then the authorization grants access to any valid  values falling in that range: A, Aaaz, B, B123, C.

ruleAuthorizationObject.description: Represents the SAP security authorization object included in the rulebook  definition and causing a conflict. Typically a 4 to 10 character identifer  with underscores such as S_TCODE, F_BKPF_BUK, M_RECH_WRK.

ruleAuthorizationField.description: Represents the SAP security authorization object field included in the rulebook  definition and causing a conflict. Typically shorter than the authorization object  and usually composed of only letters, such as ACTVT, KOART, TCD, JOBACTION.

ruleAuthorizationValueFrom.description: Represents the SAP security authorization field value from the rulebook.  Can be either a single fixed value (01), a wildcard (*), or a combination (GROUP1*).  This field should be populated for a valid rulebook definition.

ruleAuthorizationValueTo.description: Represents the SAP security authorization field value from the rulebook.  Can be either a single fixed value (01), a wildcard (*), or a combination (GROUP1*).  This field is left blank unless the rule is being defined with a range.  The range would be anything between the FROM value through the TO value.  For example, if the FROM value is A and the TO value is C, then the rule is  looking for any value falling in that range: A, Aaaz, B, B123, C.

roleType.description: Represents the category of the role. Possible values are Single, Composite, Derived.

roleIsDerived.description: Represents a boolean value indicating whether a role has been derived from,  or created based upon, another 'parent' role. Deriving roles is useful to  maintain fewer roles. One role granting access to function A can be derived  to act upon object1 vs object2. So you could have parent role Z_FUNCTION_A  and derived child roles ZD_FUNCTION_A_LOCATION1 and ZD_FUNCTION_A_LOCATION2.  Any changes to access to Function A would only be updated in role Z_FUNCTION_A  and those changes would be automatically applied to child roles.

derivedParentRole.description: Represents the name (AGR_NAME) of the Parent role if RoleIsDerived = TRUE and this a child role.

parentProfile.description: Represents the name of the composite profile assigned to the user if the access  is inherited indirectly through a single profile that is part of a composite profile.  This is uncommon as composite profiles are not supposed to be used any longer.

parentRoleName.description: Represents the name of the composite role assigned to the user if the access is  inherited indirectly through a single role that is part of a composite role.

ErpRoleModel.description: Describes erp role that can be assigned to user.

accountId.description: Account Id related to the role

systemId.description: Erp system id related to the role

securityExtractId.description: Security extract id that contains the role

roleId.description: Role id of role that owner owns

ErpRoleApproverModel.description: Describes erp role approver who validates that  the user requesting access needs that role for performing their job.

roleId.description: Role Id of the role approver.

userId.description: User Id of the role approver.

accountId.description: The id of the account the system belongs to.

name.description: The name of the ERP system.

customerId.description: Represents the id of the customer account.

SapConnectionInfoModel.description: Model that represents the SAP connection information.  It implements both marker interfaces to satisfy the current implementation  of IErpSystemService, but should be removed once we move the ERP systems  implementations to the agent permanently.

erpProductVersion.description: The version of the ERP system.

serverAddress.description: The address of the server where the system is deployed.

instanceName.description: The name of the system instance.

eamLogCollectionDelay.description: The delay in hours for EAM log collections.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the system.

sapLanguageCode.description: The SAP language code to use.

includeUserAddrTable.description: A value indicating whether to include the UserAddr table.

autoRefreshSapInfoAfterSecurityExtract.description: A value indicating whether to refresh the SAP info after a security extract.

isCuaEnabled.description: A value indicating whether Cua is enabled.

cuaChildName.description: The name of the Cua child.

cuaParentHost.description: The parent host of the Cua.

cuaParentClientNumber.description: The client number of the Cua parent.

cuaParentSystemNumber.description: The system number of the Cua parent.

UpdateSapSystemRequest.description: An object model for SAP system updates.

accountId.description: The id of the account the system belongs to.

createdBy.description: The username of the user that created the entity.

createdDate.description: The date/time value when the entity was created.

updatedBy.description: The username of the user that last updated the entity.

updatedDate.description: The date/time value when the entity was last updated.

id.description: The id of the system to update

name.description: The name of the ERP system.

LoadExtractInfoModel.description: Represents parameters for Load Extract Info job.

fileUrl.description: Url of the file on storage.

valid.description: Flags if overall validation was successful

EamAdminSummaryEmailSettingsModel.description: Model contains settings for sending EAM Awaiting Review Reminders

timezone.description: Local timezone, id of timezone in the IANA

recurrenceJobId.description: Unique identifier of the job which is used for triggering email send  Null means that job is not created yet

CreateErpSystemRequest_SfConnectionModel.description: Represents data required to create new ERP system

name.description: The name of the ERP system.

customerId.description: Represents the id of the customer account.

UpdateErpSystemRequest_SfConnectionModel.description: Represents data required to update ERP system

id.description: The id of the system to update

name.description: The name of the ERP system.
